REST_controller module¶

REST_controller.analyze(request)[source]¶

This function handles POST request sent to /analyze.

Parameters:request (Request) – the received request
Returns:a json object with the results array
Return type:JSONResponse
REST_controller.detect(request)[source]¶

This function handles POST request sent to /detect.

Parameters:request (Request) – the received request
Returns:an array of result image paths
Return type:JSONResponse
REST_controller.index(request)[source]¶

An index API which returns the main webapge.

Parameters:request (Request) – the received request
Returns:the requested html file
Return type:HTMLResponse
REST_controller.send_email(request)[source]¶

This function handles POST request sent to /email.

Parameters:request (Request) – the received request
Returns:Empty JSON response to finish handling the request
Return type:JSONResponse
